description: A thin wrapper around the Node.js mailparser module to resolve base 64 encoded RFC5322 formatted messages into structured fields. The mailparser module is maintained as part of the NodeMailer project.
name: NodeMailer Email Parser
plugin_instructions:
The plugin provides the following actions that wrap IMAPFlow functions:

"Parse Raw Email" accepts a base 64 string containing the full RFC5322 formatted message. Returns a flattened representation of the RFC5322 tree, including three list fields containing attachment information. A list of attachment file names, a list of MIME content types, and the list of base 64 encoded contents.
